body_html:
I do not believe this is a bug. As @yaroslavvb says, this is just a racy program which allows arbitrary interleavings of two variable reads and writes.

If you examine the graphdef this should be more clear.

Since this is not a TensorFlow bug, please direct any followup questions to StackOverflow.

body:
I do not believe this is a bug.  As @yaroslavvb says, this is just a racy program which allows arbitrary interleavings of two variable reads and writes.

If you examine the graphdef this should be more clear.

Since this is not a TensorFlow bug, please direct any followup questions to StackOverflow.
